title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 486.2 - Release of liens
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 486.2 - Release of liens

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 509(6)

The State Tax Commission may, upon application to it and
the payment of a fee of one dollar release any motor vehicle from the lien of
any fees, taxes, penalties or interest imposed by this law provided that
payment be made to the commission of such sum as it deems adequate
consideration for such release, or a deposit be made of such security or such
bond be filed as the commission deems proper to secure the payment of such
fees, taxes, penalties or interest. The application for the release must
contain an accurate description of the motor vehicle to be released together
with the other required information. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
486.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
